response.overview: WHAT DO YOU DO WHEN YOU HAVE, TWO MEN : TWO DIFFERENT HUSTLES : AND ONE MAIN GOAL WHAT HAPPENS WHEN THE ONE'S YOU TRUST THE MOST IS THE MAIN ONES GUNNING FOR YOU TO FAIL BASED IN CHICAGO IS A MOVIE THAT WILL GIVE YOU AN INSIDE LOOK AT THE RAP GAME THE GRIND, THE HUSTLE, AND EVERYTHING IN BETWEEN TWO MEN TRYING TO BE THE NEXT BIG RAP ARTIST, BUT CAN THEY SURVIVE THE CUT-THROAT HIPHOP BUSINESS AND STAY ALIVE AT THE SAME TIME. THIS IS A MOVIE THAT SHOWS HOW WHAT ARTISTS RAP ABOUT ACTUALLY BECOMES A REALITY.
response.title: A Part of the Game
